entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 11. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Showers beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
